mapper.select: SELECT id, dept_nm as deptNm, p_title as pTitle, p_type as pType, customer, task_contents as taskContents, area, working_form as workingForm, mod_id as modId, reg_id as regId, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MISS') mogDate FROM todo WHERE dept_nm = #{deptNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p_type= 'main'
